text: Rinzia torquata, commonly known as necklace rinzia, is a plant species of the family Myrtaceae endemic to Western Australia. The shrub is found in the southern Wheatbelt region of Western Australia. ==References== torquata Category:Endemic flora of Western Australia Category:Myrtales of Australia Category:Rosids of Western Australia Category:Vulnerable flora of Australia Category:Plants described in 2017 Category:Taxa named by Barbara Lynette Rye Category:Taxa named by Malcolm Eric Trudgen
title: Rinzia torquata
